A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I saw the movie a second time now... the first time i was so disappointed with the whole story because it wasn't as expected... my hero\, the parental speculation\, Snoke - etc. Etc. 

After rewatching it - I think it's brilliant. As soon you throw all your speculations into the garbage bin. 

Not everything is perfect\, sometimes the humor is out of place\, and the casino story is a bit unnecessary but the movie is about failure!! Finn & Rose fails to save the ship and much worse : The Master code dude DJ betrays them and
